H0.text: which mode is used for short wave broadcast service. AM (Amplitude Modulation)

H1.text: which mode is used for short wave broadcast service. FM (Frequency Modulation)

H2.text: which mode is used for short wave broadcast service. SSB (Single Sideband)

H3.text: which mode is used for short wave broadcast service. MFSK

A4.text: Amplitude modulation is the most commonly used for shortwave broadcasting.
